title: Illaoi Skins
body: This question has literally been haunting my dreams... When will more Illaoi skins be released? :3

replies.body:
Yeah, because champs that have been around for a while now, like {{champion:143}} , totally have bulk skins available (the base skin, the skin on release (wildfire) and haunted). 
Illaoi is relatively new, so give it some time.

Rito tend to focus skin development on the more popular champs, you can look at champs that were included right from the start, that have less skins available than something from a couple of years ago.

This isn't to screw the fans of particular champs, it's just good business practice.
Don't get mad, it's actually very logical from Rito's standpoint.

Illaoi will likely get a skin before the end of the year, or early next year.

Every champion up until illaoi has had a new skin (even kindred) so logic dictates that its around a year before a new champ gets a skin.

thats an estimate though.
when there is a good idea. hint: there are barely any viabale illaoi skin ideas
